name: Truly Sublime
description:
Could a fabulous opportunity await the all-girl soul band "Truly Sublime?"

All they have to do is call the number on a mysterious flyer to be part of a luxurious reality TV show on a private island and propel themselves into the spotlight.

But is this island a prosperous paradise filled with the promise of opportunity, or a deadly game of cat and mouse for those desperate enough to heed it's siren call?

The singers arrive on the island only to find it deserted and what should have been a simple audition descends into a struggle for survival.

Content warning - This game contains subjects like death, murder, mental health problems, moderate language, moderate blood and supernatural themes.

Truly Sublime is an unsettling visual novel made in one month  for Spooktober 4th Annual Visual Novel Jam.

This short game features three narrative endings. Estimated playtime is around 2 hours to complete all endings and about 45 minutes for one ending.

Story, design and development by DoubleFree.

Playtesting and editing by Robert McConvey fron Valhallions.

Original score by DoubleFree made using the Groovepad app which is available here.

Visual assets are from CC0 creative commons resources which are credited in game.

I've also included a mac build but unfortunately I don't have the ability to test it. I think it should work though.


Happy Spooktober everyone!
